response.overview: A chilling anthology of six stories where ordinary lives spiral into terror as unseen threats close in from every side. Each tale unravels a different nightmare lurking beneath everyday lifeâ€”predators, captors, dark bargains, and sinister strangers hiding in plain sight. As reality slips, every character is forced to confront the danger they never saw coming.
response.tagline: Evil is Closer Than You Think
response.title: Cursed Encounters
